item.title: 資訊安全與管理筆記
item.description: 目錄 第一週 第二週 第三週 第一週 推薦書 William Stallings. Cryptography and Network Security: Principles and Practice (7th Edition). Prentice Hall, 2017(主要) Behrouz A. Forouzan. Introduction to Cryptography and Network Security. McGraw-Hill, 2007. Douglas R. Stinson. Cryptography : theory and practice (3/e). Boca Raton : Chapman & Hall/CRC, 2006. Bruce Schneier. Applied Cryptography: Protocols,
